verses.verse: Then <WG1161> said he <WG2036> unto <WG4314> the disciples <WG3101>, It is <WG2076> impossible <WG418> but <WG3361> that offences <WG4625> will come <WG2064> : but <WG1161> woe <WG3759> unto him , through <WG1223> whom <WG3739> they come <WG2064> !

It were better <WG3081> for him <WG846> that <WG1487> a millstone <WG3458> <WG3684> were hanged <WG4029> about <WG4012> his <WG846> neck <WG5137> , and <WG2532> he cast <WG4496> into <WG1519> the sea <WG2281> , than <WG2228> that <WG2443> he should offend <WG4624> one <WG1520> of these <WG5130> little ones <WG3398> .

¶ Take heed <WG4337> to yourselves <WG1438> : If <WG1161> <WG1437> thy <WG4675> brother <WG80> trespass <WG264> against <WG1519> thee <WG4571> , rebuke <WG2008> him <WG846> ; and <WG2532> if <WG1437> he repent <WG3340> , forgive <WG863> him <WG846> .

And <WG2532> if <WG1437> he trespass <WG264> against <WG1519> thee <WG4571> seven times <WG2034> in a day <WG2250> , and <WG2532> seven times <WG2034> in a day <WG2250> turn again <WG1994> to <WG1909> thee <WG4571> , saying <WG3004> , I repent <WG3340> ; thou shalt forgive <WG863> him <WG846> .
And <WG2532> the apostles <WG652> said <WG2036> unto the Lord <WG2962>, Increase <WG4369> our <WG2254> faith <WG4102>.

And <WG1161> the Lord <WG2962> said <WG2036>, If <WG1487> ye had <WG2192> faith <WG4102> as <WG5613> a grain <WG2848> of mustard seed <WG4615> , ye might <WG302> say <WG3004> unto this <WG5026> sycamine <WG4807> tree, Be thou plucked up by the root <WG1610> , and <WG2532> be thou planted <WG5452> in <WG1722> the sea <WG2281> ; and <WG2532> it should <WG302> obey <WG5219> you <WG5213> .

But <WG1161> which <WG5101> of <WG1537> you <WG5216> , having <WG2192> a servant <WG1401> plowing <WG722> or <WG2228> feeding cattle <WG4165> , will say <WG2046> unto him <WG3739> by and by <WG2112> , when he is come <WG1525> from <WG1537> the field <WG68> , Go <WG3928> and sit down to meat <WG377> ?

And <WG235> will not <WG3780> rather say <WG2046> unto him <WG846> , Make ready <WG2090> wherewith <WG5101> I may sup <WG1172> , and <WG2532> gird thyself <WG4024> , and serve <WG1247> me <WG3427> , till <WG2193> I have eaten <WG5315> and <WG2532> drunken <WG4095> ; and <WG2532> afterward <WG3326> <WG5023> thou <WG4771> shalt eat <WG5315> and <WG2532> drink <WG4095> ?
<WG3361> Doth he <WG2192> thank <WG5485> that <WG1565> servant <WG1401> because <WG3754> he did <WG4160> the things that were commanded <WG1299> him <WG846> ? I trow <WG1380> not <WG3756> .

So <WG3779> likewise <WG2532> ye <WG5210> , when <WG3752> ye shall have done <WG4160> all <WG3956> those things which are commanded <WG1299> you <WG5213> , say <WG3004> <WG3754> , We are <WG2070> unprofitable <WG888> servants <WG1401> <WG3754> : we have done <WG4160> that which <WG3739> was our duty <WG3784> to do <WG4160> .

¶ And <WG2532> it came to pass <WG1096>, as <WG1722> he <WG846> went <WG4198> to <WG1519> Jerusalem <WG2419>, that <WG2532> he <WG846> passed <WG1330> through <WG1223> the midst <WG3319> of Samaria <WG4540> and <WG2532> Galilee <WG1056>.

And <WG2532> as he <WG846> entered <WG1525> into <WG1519> a certain <WG5100> village <WG2968>, there met <WG528> him <WG846> ten <WG1176> men <WG435> that were lepers <WG3015>, which <WG3739> stood <WG2476> afar off <WG4207>:
And <WG2532> they <WG846> lifted up <WG142> their voices <WG5456>, and said <WG3004>, Jesus <WG2424>, Master <WG1988>, have mercy <WG1653> on us <WG2248>.

And <WG2532> when he saw <WG1492> them, he said <WG2036> unto them <WG846>, Go <WG4198> shew <WG1925> yourselves <WG1438> unto the priests <WG2409> . And <WG2532> it came to pass <WG1096>, that, as they <WG846> went <WG5217> <WG1722>, they were cleansed <WG2511>.

And <WG1161> one <WG1520> of <WG1537> them <WG846>, when he saw <WG1492> that <WG3754> he was healed <WG2390>, turned back <WG5290>, and with <WG3326> a loud <WG3173> voice <WG5456> glorified <WG1392> God <WG2316>,

And <WG2532> fell down <WG4098> on <WG1909> his face <WG4383> at <WG3844> his <WG846> feet <WG4228>, giving <WG2168> him <WG846> thanks <WG2168>: and <WG2532> he <WG846> was <WG2258> a Samaritan <WG4541>.
And <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> answering <WG611> said <WG2036>, Were there <WG2511> not <WG3780> ten <WG1176> cleansed <WG2511> ? but <WG1161> where <WG4226> are the nine <WG1767> ?
There are <WG2147> not <WG3756> found <WG2147> that returned <WG5290> to give <WG1325> glory <WG1391> to God <WG2316> , save <WG1508> this <WG3778> stranger <WG241> .
And <WG2532> he said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Arise <WG450> , go thy way <WG4198> : thy <WG4675> faith <WG4102> hath made <WG4982> thee <WG4571> whole <WG4982> .

¶ And <WG1161> when he was demanded <WG1905> of <WG5259> the Pharisees <WG5330>, when <WG4219> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> should come <WG2064>, he answered <WG611> them <WG846> and <WG2532> said <WG2036>, The kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> cometh <WG2064> not <WG3756> with <WG3326> observation <WG3907> :

Neither <WG3761> shall they say <WG2046> , Lo <WG2400> here <WG5602> ! or <WG2228> , lo <WG2400> there <WG1563> ! for <WG1063> , behold <WG2400> , the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> is <WG2076> within <WG1787> you <WG5216> .

And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> unto <WG4314> the disciples <WG3101>, The days <WG2250> will come <WG2064> , when <WG3753> ye shall desire <WG1937> to see <WG1492> one <WG3391> of the days <WG2250> of the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> , and <WG2532> ye shall <WG3700> not <WG3756> see <WG3700> it .

And <WG2532> they shall say <WG2046> to you <WG5213> , See <WG2400> here <WG5602> ; or <WG2228> , see <WG2400> there <WG1563> : go <WG565> not <WG3361> after <WG565> them , nor <WG3366> follow <WG1377> them .

For <WG1063> as <WG5618> the lightning <WG796> , that lighteneth <WG797> out of <WG1537> the one part under <WG5259> heaven <WG3772> , shineth <WG2989> unto <WG1519> the other part under <WG5259> heaven <WG3772> ; so <WG3779> shall also <WG2532> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> be <WG2071> in <WG1722> his <WG846> day <WG2250> .
But <WG1161> first <WG4412> must <WG1163> he <WG846> suffer <WG3958> many things <WG4183> , and <WG2532> be rejected <WG593> of <WG575> this <WG5026> generation <WG1074> .

And <WG2532> as <WG2531> it was <WG1096> in <WG1722> the days <WG2250> of Noe <WG3575> , so <WG3779> shall it be <WG2071> also <WG2532> in <WG1722> the days <WG2250> of the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> .

They did eat <WG2068> , they drank <WG4095> , they married wives <WG1060> , they were given in marriage <WG1547> , until <WG891> the day <WG2250> that <WG3739> Noe <WG3575> entered <WG1525> into <WG1519> the ark <WG2787> , and <WG2532> the flood <WG2627> came <WG2064> , and <WG2532> destroyed <WG622> them all <WG537> .

Likewise <WG3668> also <WG2532> as <WG5613> it was <WG1096> in <WG1722> the days <WG2250> of Lot <WG3091> ; they did eat <WG2068> , they drank <WG4095> , they bought <WG59> , they sold <WG4453> , they planted <WG5452> , they builded <WG3618> ;

But <WG3739> <WG1161> the same day <WG2250> that Lot <WG3091> went <WG1831> out of <WG575> Sodom <WG4670> it rained <WG1026> fire <WG4442> and <WG2532> brimstone <WG2303> from <WG575> heaven <WG3772> , and <WG2532> destroyed <WG622> them all <WG537> .
Even <WG2596> thus <WG5024> shall it be <WG2071> in the day <WG3739> <WG2250> when the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> is revealed <WG601> .

In <WG1722> that <WG1565> day <WG2250> , he which <WG3739> shall be <WG2071> upon <WG1909> the housetop <WG1430> , and <WG2532> his <WG846> stuff <WG4632> in <WG1722> the house <WG3614> , let <WG2597> him not <WG3361> come down <WG2597> to take <WG142> it <WG846> away <WG142> : and <WG2532> he that is in <WG1722> the field <WG68> , let him <WG1994> likewise <WG3668> not <WG3361> return <WG1994> back <WG1519> <WG3694> .
Remember <WG3421> Lot's <WG3091> wife <WG1135> .

Whosoever <WG3739> <WG1437> shall seek <WG2212> to save <WG4982> his <WG846> life <WG5590> shall lose <WG622> it <WG846> ; and <WG2532> whosoever <WG3739> <WG1437> shall lose <WG622> his <WG846> life shall preserve <WG2225> it <WG846> .

I tell <WG3004> you <WG5213> , in that <WG5026> night <WG3571> there shall be <WG2071> two <WG1417> men in <WG1909> one <WG3391> bed <WG2825> ; the one <WG1520> shall be taken <WG3880> , and <WG2532> the other <WG2087> shall be left <WG863> .
Two <WG1417> women shall be <WG2071> grinding <WG229> together <WG846> <WG1909> ; the one <WG3391> shall be taken <WG3880> , and <WG2532> the other <WG2087> left <WG863> .
Two <WG1417> men shall be <WG2071> in <WG1722> the field <WG68> ; the one <WG1520> shall be taken <WG3880> , and <WG2532> the other <WG2087> left <WG863> .

And <WG2532> they answered <WG611> and said <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, Where <WG4226>, Lord <WG2962>? And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> unto them <WG846>, Wheresoever <WG3699> the body <WG4983> is , thither <WG1563> will <WG4863> the eagles <WG105> be gathered together <WG4863> .
